title: Earthquakes
description:
Wes Hazard, Kevin Allison and Laura Bearing share stories about racist keg parties, smiles in the sky, and a sister's struggles.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Ennio Morricone, Wes Hazard, Kevin Allison, Louis Prima, Patty Griffin, Bob Schneider, Laura Bearing, Plaid)
